author: Lachlan Markay
title: How Russian efforts to influence D.C. took off in recent years
description: The numbers show the scale of a lobbying-and-propaganda apparatus now crumbling under the weight of U.S. sanctions.
content:
Reported Russian spending on its influence efforts in the United States skyrocketed during the years before its invasion of Ukraine last week, records show.
